trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on ability checks and attack rolls.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Piercing damage.
